text:
Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Thanks in advance for your help!

Thank You Teja:
I have another question, as My each install depends on each users event, and each user will have a different event and they will need to access my Platform using a unique API key, when user click the install is there a way we prompt the page where user can input its Key and that way they can access their relative Event.  How can I achieve that
I want a prompt that will demand the access key
same way like we see on Zapier or other tools.
